mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(member_identification, member_password, member_name, member_age, member_nickname, member_email) values(#{memberIdentification}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge},#{memberNickname}, #{memberEmail})
mapper.select: select member_id from tbl_member where member_identification = #{memberIdentification}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_resume (resume_original_name, resume_system_name, member_id) values(#{resumeOriginalName}, #{resumeSystemName}, #{memberId});
mapper.select: select member_id from tbl_member where member_identification = #{memberIdentification} and member_password = #{memberPassword}
select member_system_name from tbl_member where member_id = #{memberId}
select resume_existence from tbl_member m join tbl_resume r on m.member_id = r.member_id where m.member_id = #{memberId};
select member_id from tbl_member where member_identification = #{memberIdentification}
select member_id from tbl_member where member_nickname = #{memberNickname}
select member_id from tbl_member where member_email = #{memberEmail}
select member_identification from tbl_member where member_email = #{memberEmail} and member_nickname=#{memberNickname} and member_name = #{memberName}
select member_id from tbl_member where member_email = #{memberEmail} and member_identification = #{memberIdentification}
